data.title: †Za・V-kei-ppoi Kyoku† / †ザ・V系っぽい曲†
data.meta_description: †The V-kei-like Song†(1) (Every day every night everything’s gonna be alright wanna 100 yen store can do!)(2)My kamiban broke up a long time agoSince my daihonmei announced they’re going major at a recent live, I’ve lost interest in themBarely anyone goes to see my honmei’s do-minor band, so it’s funMy special band are coming to…
data.text:
†The V-kei-like Song†(1)

(Every day every night everything’s gonna be alright wanna 100 yen store can do!)(2)

My kamiban broke up a long time ago

Since my daihonmei announced they’re going major at a recent live, I’ve lost interest in them

Barely anyone goes to see my honmei’s do-minor band, so it’s fun

My special band are coming to my home area, but I have exams that day orz(3)

Uh… in the lonely darkness, I search for you

I want to meet you, I can’t meet you, be with me, hold me

Don’t go, don’t go, only you closed my love

Blooming, scattered, sweat-stained

Covered in bruises, don’t stop! It’s fun love visual

(Every day every night everything’s gonna be alright wanna 100 yen store can do!)

This is rocking my heart Whatcha gonna Beat Shuffle(4)

A fearfully trembling NEET’s future What is this? Thousand-armed Kannon?

Knee-high socks bewitching everybody Faraway morning beer

Parties fucking couple What is this? Thousand-armed Kannon?

The you that I loved has changed, you’re wearing less makeup and making pop music

Where is the you who used to spit up blood? I like you without makeup too, I like you, I like you but…

Your new song is so sparkly, for some reason I can’t get into it

Did you throw your old songs down the drain? If so, I will dredge that drain

Uh… blood-smeared glass, telling the time

Swaying, swaying, bewildered, bewildered

Jealous, Shit!(5) I cried all night (oh! real gold!)

You’re selfish to do something like this

You’re embarrassing me with your show-off (member call)

Golden Bomber, put on a show! (rock you!)

Beneath the moonlight, an eternal prayer…

Undiscoverable by anyone (moonright legend)

In this world without you, I sing this song…

Hold me tight forever, just like this, take me away

Take me away to your dressing room and hold on me

Don’t say things like “Last song!”, keep going

Come out on stage once more (encore!)

I can’t meet you, be with me, hold me

Don’t go, don’t go, only you closed my love

Blooming, scattered, sweat-stained, covered in bruises

Don’t stop! It’s fun love visual! LaLaLaLa…

In the midst of the tragedy in which I met you, the devouring hands of the clock

Colored my heart with delusional hallucinations.

Farewell…, Mr……………….

Farewell…, Joanne……………….(6)

†ザ・V系っぽい曲†

(エビデイ エビナイ エビシン ゴナビー オーライ ワナ 100均キャンドゥ！)

神盤はとっくのとうに解散してそれっきり

大本命はこの前ライブで「メジャー行き」を言われてなんか冷めた

本命のドマイナー盤は客が少なくて楽しい

別格のバンドが地元へ来てくれるけど試験と被ってるorz

Uh… 孤独の闇の中、君を探す

会いたくて 会えなくて 側にいて 抱きしめて

消えないで 消えないで 君だけがclosed my love

咲き乱れ 散り乱れ 汗まみれ

アザまみれ やめないで! 楽しくてlove visual

(エビデイ エビナイ エビシン ゴナビー オーライ ワナ 100均キャンドゥ！)

ディスイズロッケンマイヤー ワチゴナビートシャッフォー

gkbrニートsフューチャー 何コレ?千手観音?

エビバデ悩殺ニーハイ ファラウェイモーニンbeer

パッティズファッキンカッポー 何コレ?千手観音?

大好きな貴方が変わった メイク薄くPOP路線

血糊吐いてた貴方は何処へ?スッピンも好きよ、好きだよ、好きだけど…

新曲はキラキラしててなんとなく気に入らない

昔の曲はドブに捨てたの? ならば私はそのドブを浚おう

Uh… 血塗られたグラス、時を告げる

揺らめいて 揺らめいて 戸惑って 戸惑って

嫉妬して Shit!して 泣き明かした(oh! real gold!)

貴方って勝手ね、そうやって

私を困らせて 振り回すの(member call!)

ゴールデンボンバー演奏しろ!(ロックユー!)

月明かりの下、永久の祈りを…

誰にも見つけられない(moonright legend)

君の居ないこの世界で僕はこの歌を…

永遠に抱きしめて このまま連れ去って

貴方の楽屋まで 連れ去ってhold on me

ラストなんて 言わないで続けて

もう一度舞台上 現れて(アンコール!)

会えなくて 側にいて 抱きしめて

消えないで 消えないで 君だけがclosed my love

咲き乱れ 散り乱れ 汗まみれ アザまみれ

やめないで! 楽しくてlove visual! LaLaLaLa…

君と出逢った悲劇の中で貪り合った時計の針は

妄想の幻覚と共に僕の胸を染めました。

さよなら…、Mr……………….

さよなら…、ジョアンヌ……………….

†Za・V-kei-ppoi Kyoku†

(Ebidei ebinai ebishin gona bii oorai wana hyakkin kyan du!)

Kamiban wa tokku no tou ni kaisan shite sorekkiri

Daihonmei wa kono mae no raibu de「mejaa iki」wo iwarete nanka sameta

Honmei no domainaa ban wa kyaku ga sukunakute tanoshii

Bekkaku no bando ga jimoto he kite kureru kedo shiken to koumutteru orz

Uh… kodoku no yami no naka, kimi wo sagasu

Aitakute aenakute soba ni ite dakishimete

Kienaide kienaide kimi dake ga closed my love

Sakimidare chirimidare asemamire

Azamamire yamenaide! Tanoshikute love visual

(Ebidei ebinai ebishin gona bii oorai wana hyakkin kyan du!)

Disu izu rokken maiyaa wachigona biito shaffoo

gkbr niitos fyuuchaa nani kore? Senju Kannon?

Ebibade nousatsu niihai farawei moonin beer

Pattizu fakkin kappoo nani kore? Senju Kannon?

Daisuki na anata ga kawwatta meiku usuku pop rosen

Chinori haiteta anata wa doko he? Suppin mo suki yo, suki da yo, suki dakedo…

Shinkyoku wa kirakira shitete nantonaku ki ni iranai

Mukashi no kyoku wa dobu ni suteta no? Naraba watashi wa sono dobu wo saraou

Uh… chinurareta gurasu, toki wo tsugeru

Yuranuite yuranuite tomadotte tomadotte

Shitto shite Shit! shite nakiakashita (oh! real gold!)

Anata tte katte ne, sou yatte

Watashi wo komarasete furimawasu no (member call!)

Gooruden bonbaa ensou shiro! (rokkyuu!)

Tsukiakari no shita, towa no inori wo…

Dare ni mo mitsukerarenai (moonright legend)

Kimi no inai kono sekai de boku wa kono uta wo…

Eien ni dakishimete kono mama tsuresatte

Anata no gakuya made tsuresatte hold on me

Rasuto nante iwanaide tsuzukete

Mou ichido budai jou arawarete (ankooru!)

Aenakute soba ni ite dakishimete

Kienaide kienaide kimi dake ga closed my love

Sakimidare chirimidare asemamire azamamire

Yamenaide! Tanoshikute love visual! LaLaLaLa…

Kimi to deatta higeki no naka de musaboriatta tokei wa

Bousou no genkaku to tomo ni boku no mune wo somemashita。

Sayonara…, Mr……………….

Sayonara…, Joannu……………….

Translator’s Notes

(1) Many people interested in Golden Bomber will of course already know what visual kei is, but for those of you who (like me) aren’t really that familiar with it: visual kei (lit. “visual style”, also “v-kei” for short) is a Japanese subculture revolving around bands who use visual aspects like makeup and clothes as a form of expression alongside their music. Some v-kei bands have become very famous, but there is also a large indie scene.

In this song, which is kind of an ode to v-kei, Kirisho uses a lot of terms that are either specific to the v-kei scene, or the Japanese music scene in general. Rather than annotate them all individually, I thought I’d provide a small glossary.

Kamiban: a band that has broken up.

(Dai)honmei: “honmei” can refer to either your favorite band or your favorite band member. “Daihonmei” is your super most favorite band(member).

Live: a live show.

Do-minor: “do-” as a prefix is an intensifier, and “minor” in this case means “indie”. So a “do-minor” band is super indie.

Member call: the part of the song where the fans call out the members’ names.

(2) This first line (and the line where it gets repeated later on) don’t appear in the written lyrics. Also, words in italics are sung in English. As usual, I’ve left any misspellings intact.

(3) “orz” is a fatigued or despaired emoticon, which represents a stick figure kneeling or bowing with the “o” being the head, the “r” being the arms and part of the body, and the “z” being part of the body and the legs. The emoticon is only found in the written lyrics, he doesn’t sing it out loud.

(4) This verse was hell. Most of the English words you see here were spelled out in katakana, often using unconventional spellings. As such, I can’t guarantee that I interpreted everything correctly. A few specific noteworthy things about this verse:

“Beat Shuffle” is Kirisho giving a shout-out to a Japanese radio program.

The word Kirisho uses for “fearfully trembling” is “gkbr”, which is Japanese internet slang derived from the onomatopoeia “gakugaku” and “buruburu”, both of which mean “trembling”.

A “NEET” is a person who is “Not in Education, Employment, or Training”.

“Kannon” (known as “Gyuanyin” in China) refers to the goddess of mercy, who is often depicted as having a thousand arms. As for what she’s doing in this song… who can say?

(5) “Jealous, Shit!” is a pun, as both the Japanese word for “jealousy” and the English word “shit” are pronounced “shitto” in Japanese.

(6) This line might just be a random girl’s name, but it also could be a reference to v-kei band Janne Da Arc, who went on hiatus in 2007. “Mr.” possibly refers to the band “Mr. Children”, though since they aren’t v-kei, the link isn’t as strong.

Music & lyrics by Sho Kiryuin.
